alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 8:14AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Itasca, northeastern Aitkin and western St. Louis Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 812 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Libby, or near Big Sandy Lake, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jacobson around 825 AM CDT. Swan River around 830 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca
